NAME: Glenfiddich - Pure Malt 1980's 1L
DESCRIPTION: Released to celebrate the distilleries Centenary in 1987, this rare bottle Glenfiddich Pure Malt is becoming increasingly hard to find.  It includes a limited edition print.  This is a 1L bottling

NAME: Peat Faerie - 10 Year Old - SMWS Batch #3
DESCRIPTION: Batch 3 was discovered when developing its predecessor. The Tasting Panel sampled a number of blended recipes at different proportions, strengths and ages and some of the younger blends were among the highest scoring. This 10-year old matured exclusively in Ex-bourbon barrels from Islay and Speyside.

NAME: Bunnahabhain - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
This Bunnahabhain 12 Year Old is an old-style bottling from Islay distillery. 
With milder tones, this would be an ideal introduction to the Islay malts.

NAME: Highland Park - Valkyrie
DESCRIPTION:
Valkyrie is the first of Highland Park’s new Viking Legend series.  Valknut & Valhalla are the other releases in this series. 
Matured in a combination of first-fill American oak sherry, Bourbon and Spanish oak sherry casks and some refill casks. The packaging design was created by Danish designer Jim Lyngvild with inspiration drawn from the ancient Hammer Stone of Gotland and a Viking pendant from Upland, Sweden.
This single malt was awarded The Chairman’s Trophy in the 2017 Ultimate Spirits Challenge, scoring 99 out of 100.

NAME: Ballantine's - 12 Year Old - Gold Seal
DESCRIPTION: Ballantine's Gold Seal takes in 40 of Scotlands greatest malts. It was matured in Oak casks for 12 years or more to produce this lovely 'liquid gold' blend.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 12 Year Old - Lasanta
DESCRIPTION: Glenmorangie Lasanta has now been created with an age statement of 12 years old. The single malt was finished in both oloroso and Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. 'Lasanta' is said to mean 'warmth and passion' in Gaelic.

NAME: Berry Bros & Rudd - Sherry Cask Blended Whisky
DESCRIPTION:
Berry Bros has a history that is pretty spectacular...it has two royal warrants and 300+ years of history. Still trading from its original base and home - No3 St James Street London.
From Berry themself...
"Sherry casks are considered a luxury in Whisky making. These expensive barrels imbue a spirit with distinctive notes of deep fruit, citrus and nuts. Our Classic Sherry Cask Malt is blended from the best Sherry butts to deliver a balanced expression of this uniquely engaging style."

NAME: Nikka - Whisky From The Barrel - 50cl
DESCRIPTION: Nikka From the Barrel is a blend from The Nikka Whisky Distilling Co.  Matured malt grain whiskies from the Miyagikyo and Yoichi distilleries have been blended and recasked.  The blend won the top prize in its category at the World Whisky Awards in 2007 and 2010.

NAME: Ballantine's - 12 Year Old - Gold Seal
DESCRIPTION: Ballantine's Gold Seal takes in 40 of Scotlands greatest malts. It was matured in Oak casks for 12 years or more to produce this lovely 'liquid gold' blend.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old 20cl
DESCRIPTION: A 20cl of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.

NAME: Benromach - Sassicaia Wood Finish - 2019
DESCRIPTION: Benromach released the 2011 edition of its Sassicaia Wood Finish recently. Like the previous editions (2005, 2006,2007 and 2009) it was originally matured in first-fill bourbon barrels before being finished for just under 2 years in wine casks from the Bolgheri region in Tuscany, Italy.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 10 Year Old Blended Malt
DESCRIPTION: A 10 Year Old blended malt by Famous Grouse.

NAME: Glenkinchie - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This 10 year old is an older style bottling from Glenkinchie Distillery, that comes presented in the famous orange box - with the classic malt stamp on the front of the box. The Glenkinchie 10 year old has since been replaced by the 12 year old.

NAME: Mars - Maltage Cosmo Blended Malt
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling is a somewhat of a joining of two whiskies that have been distilled both in Japan and in Scotland. 
It was first released in 2015 and have rave reviews at the Tokyo International Bar Show and due to this, it is now a full-time member of the Mars Core range.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old (1990s) 35cl
DESCRIPTION: This is an older style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet.  The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers. This is a 1-litre bottling.

NAME: Auchroisk - 10 Year Old 2009 - Douglas Laing  - UK Exclusive
DESCRIPTION:
A UK exclusive from independent bottler Douglas Laing.  This Authroisk 10 Year Old Exclusively Bottled for UK Emporiums.  Distilled in March 2009 and bottled May 2019 at the natural Cask Strength of 62.1%, without colouring and chill-filtration.  One of 216 bottles charged from Refill Hogshead DL1335.
One of the most respected and highly acclaimed independent bottlers of Scotch Whisky, Douglas Laing & Co has been established since 1948. The company is based in Glasgow and boasts a great selection of brands including its "Remarkable Regional Malts" range, encompassing The Epicurean, Timorous Beastie, Scallywag, Rock Island and Big Peat, as well as Old Particular, Provenance and Xtra Old Particular, which they collectively call their "Exceptional Single Casks".

NAME: Dimple - 15 Year Old 75cl
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: John Haig  Co Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: This a classic 15-Year-Old deluxe blend. Based on Glenkinchie with traces of other more northerly distilleries, Dimple benefits from an extended marrying period.

NAME: Auchroisk - 10 Year Old 2009 - Douglas Laing  - UK Exclusive
DESCRIPTION:
A UK exclusive from independent bottler Douglas Laing.  This Authroisk 10 Year Old Exclusively Bottled for UK Emporiums.  Distilled in March 2009 and bottled May 2019 at the natural Cask Strength of 62.1%, without colouring and chill-filtration.  One of 216 bottles charged from Refill Hogshead DL1335.

NAME: Wolfburn - Aurora Sherry Oak
DESCRIPTION:
Now the most northern distillery in the mainland UK, Wolfburn has been operating since 2013.
40% in second-fill quarter casks.
40% in first-fill ex-bourbon barrels.
20% in first-fill Oloroso sherry hogsheads. 
Labelled Sherry Oak...

NAME: Auchroisk - 10 Year Old 2009 - Douglas Laing  - UK Exclusive
DESCRIPTION:
A UK exclusive from independent bottler Douglas Laing.  This Authroisk 10 Year Old Exclusively Bottled for UK Emporiums.  Distilled in March 2009 and bottled May 2019 at the natural Cask Strength of 62.1%, without colouring and chill-filtration.  One of 216 bottles charged from Refill Hogshead DL1335.

NAME: Arran - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This 10 Year Old Arran single malt is part of their core range. Bottled unchillfiltered at 46%.

NAME: Talisker - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.

NAME: Highland Park - Viking Tribe
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2018, this new release from Highland Park was originally only available through Amazon UK. 
"Viking Tribe" is now part of the core Highland Park range. 
This single malt was released as a celebration of the togetherness shown by the Vikings.

NAME: Robbie Burns - Old Scotch Whisky 1970s
DESCRIPTION: Robbie Burns Blend from the 1970s. A tribute to Robert Burns, 'combining the best of Scottish ingredients and skill wherever good company is found, Burns will be remembered and Scotch whisky will be enjoyed.'

NAME: Glenfiddich - Pure Malt 1980's 1L
DESCRIPTION: Released to celebrate the distilleries Centenary in 1987, this rare bottle Glenfiddich Pure Malt is becoming increasingly hard to find.  It includes a limited edition print.  This is a 1L bottling

NAME: Benromach - Organic - 2010
DESCRIPTION:
Benromach Organic was distilled in 2010 in Virgin American Oak Casks and then later bottled in 2016. 
Every step of the careful making of this whisky is Certified Organic, this whisky also meets the rigorous UK Soil Association standards regarding growing the ingredients, distillation, maturing and bottling.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 12 Year Old - Lasanta
DESCRIPTION: Glenmorangie Lasanta has now been created with an age statement of 12 years old. The single malt was finished in both oloroso and Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. 'Lasanta' is said to mean 'warmth and passion' in Gaelic.

NAME: Haig's - Dimple (1970s)
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: John Haig  Co Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
Produced by Haig and its claim to fame if the fact that it was the first container to be trademarked by the US Patent office.
This blend is one of the earliest Dimple recipe used by John Haig.
13 1/3 FL. Ozs
70 Proof

NAME: Chieftain's - Caol Ila - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
The bottle was distilled in September 1991 at Caol Ila Distillery in a Hogshead cask and bottled by The Chieftains in January 2002 when it was 10 years old. 
The cask number was 13356-13363 and it was bottled at 43% ABV. Only 3028 bottles were produced.

NAME: Berry Bros & Rudd - Sherry Cask Blended Malt
DESCRIPTION: This sherry-cask matured blended malt was showcases the best of sherry-cask whisky.

NAME: That Boutique-y Rum Company - 3 Year Old - O Reizinho - Batch 1
DESCRIPTION: This is the second bottling of rum produced by Portugal's O Reizinho from That Boutique-y Rum Company. This is a 3-year-old expression, Batch 1 is a release of 1,936 bottles.

NAME: Jack Daniel's - Single Barrel Select
DESCRIPTION: The Single Barrel Select barrels are carefully chosen from the upper floors of our barrelhouses, where the whisk(e)y develops a robustness of character through more interaction with our handmade toasted and charred, American oak barrels. Bottled at 90 proof, this whisk(e)y has subtle notes of caramel and spice, balanced with bright and fruit notes and sweet aromatics.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Mini Set (6x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This Glenmorangie gift set contains 2 x 5cl bottles:

NAME: Caol Ila - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A lovely bottle of Caol Ila 12, said to be perfect entry point to the world of peaty whisky.
Caol Ila is currently undergoing mass reconstruction and should be ready in 2020.

NAME: Caol Ila - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A lovely bottle of Caol Ila 12, said to be perfect entry point to the world of peaty whisky.
Caol Ila is currently undergoing mass reconstruction and should be ready in 2020.

NAME: 6 x Assorted Minis
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 6 x assorted minis:

NAME: Tormore - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 12 year old single malt from the Speyside distillery, Tormore.  Launched in 2004 this is the distillery's main official bottling.  Tormore is part of the Chivas Brothers portfolio of distilleries.

NAME: Ardbeg - 17 & 10 Year Old (2x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This mini set includes:  
Ardbeg - 17 Year Old - 5cl, 40%: Ardbeg 17 year old is an increasingly rare bottling, it has been discontinued for a good few years. The first bottling of this sparked the revival of Ardbeg's fortunes after the takeover by Glenmorangie. This is a 5cl bottling.
Ardbeg - 10 Year Old - 5cl, 46%: Ardbeg Ten Year Old is known around the world as the peatiest, smokiest, most complex single malt of them all. Yet it does not flaunt the peat; rather it gives way to the natural sweetness of the malt to produce a whisky of perfect balance. Named World Whisky of the Year in 2008.

NAME: Allied Distillers - Queen's Award Miniature Set (10 x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: Allied Distillers Queen's Award Miniature Selection - this set includes 10 x 5cl:

NAME: Caol Ila - Wilson & Morgan 8 Year Old.
DESCRIPTION:
A vintage Caol Ila single malt imported by Rossi & Rossi - Treviso.
It was distilled in 2011 and bottled in 2019 at 46% from cask #45/47/49/50/51/59 for the Wilson & Morgan Barrel Selection.

NAME: Caol Ila - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A lovely bottle of Caol Ila 12, said to be perfect entry point to the world of peaty whisky.
Caol Ila is currently undergoing mass reconstruction and should be ready in 2020.

NAME: Bimber - 1st Release - The Perfect Measure (5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 5cl sample of Bimber - First Release.
One of only 1000 bottles the Bimber Inaugural release was handcrafted and aged in Ex Pedro Ximenez Sherry Casks.
5 casks were used to make the Polish creators first malt - number 6,19,31,37 and 38.
After imigrating from Poland, the founder Dariusz Plazewski pursued his passion for distilling. We must say, we are very glad he did!
Huge congrats to all that were involved in this special release. Only 800 bottles were released to the UK market and the other 200 were avalable internationally.

NAME: Kilchoman - Machir Bay
DESCRIPTION:
Kilchoman's Machir Bay matured in ex-bourbon barrels and Oloroso Sherry butts.
Possibly one of the lesser known of the Islay malts but a real must try if you haven't already!

NAME: Asbach Uralt - Brandy 1L
DESCRIPTION:
Asbach Uralt Brandy.
This bottle is 1litre and 38% ABV.

NAME: Dewars - White Label
DESCRIPTION: Dewar's White Label was created in 1899 and has remained a best selling, blended Scotch for over a century.  It is a hugely popular blend, especially Stateside.

NAME: Jack Daniel's - Single Barrel Select
DESCRIPTION: The Single Barrel Select barrels are carefully chosen from the upper floors of our barrelhouses, where the whisk(e)y develops a robustness of character through more interaction with our handmade toasted and charred, American oak barrels. Bottled at 90 proof, this whisk(e)y has subtle notes of caramel and spice, balanced with bright and fruit notes and sweet aromatics.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Viking Honour + 18 Year Old 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park has revamped their packaging and the embossing on this bottle really does look as good as it tastes. 
This gift set includes a 5cl of Highland Park 18 Year Old (43.0% ABV)

NAME: Laphroaig - Quarter Cask
DESCRIPTION: A younger, lively Laphroaig that has had the maturation process speeded up by ageing in quarter casks.  As the size of the cask is smaller the maturation doesn't need to be as long. This process has created a soft sweetness and a velvety feel when first tasted, then the intense peatiness so unique to Laphroaig comes bursting through.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old  with 2 x Glasses
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park has revamped their packaging and the embossing on this bottle really does look as good as it tastes.
This gift set includes 2 x glasses.

NAME: Benromach - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 10 year old single malt from Benromach Distillery in Speyside. It was handcrafted by just 2 men, at what was Speyside's smallest distillery.

NAME: Benromach - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 10 year old single malt from Benromach Distillery in Speyside. It was handcrafted by just 2 men, at what was Speyside's smallest distillery.

NAME: Royal Brackla - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Distilled at the Highland distillery, this Royal Brackla was aged for 10 years. Brackla Distillery was the first Distillery to be granted the Royal Warrant in 1835 by King William IV.

NAME: Ballantine's - Celebration
DESCRIPTION: This is a special limited edition Ballantine's bottled to celebrate the Queen's visit to Allied Distillers in July 2003.

NAME: VAT 69 (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Vat 69 was originally bottled in Port bottles, it maintained this iconic look for over 100 years.  This is a 1L bottling.

NAME: Caol Ila - 9 Year Old - Old Malt Cask & Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Caol Ila's on the North shores of Islay are known for its versatility, it caters for Johnnie Walker but this single malt at 9 years old is something to behold.
Bottled at cask strength this 'Advance Sample'  was bottled in January 2019 after being distilled in a red wine cask #15700 in September 2009.

NAME: Cragganmore - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A distillery owned by the spirits giant Diageo, Cragganmore is one of their Speyside malts that more than holds its own year on year.
Haven't tried it and like a smooth Speyside? This is your bottle!

NAME: Aberlour - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

NAME: Jura - 10 Year Old (1990s)
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling of Jura 10 Year Old is from the 1980s. 
Originally built in 1810, Jura Distillery fell into disrepair and was revived in 1960s by two local estate owners.  Jura Distillery is still the only one on the island.

NAME: Talisker - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.

NAME: Ben Bracken - Speyside Single Malt
DESCRIPTION: This Ben Bracken Islay single malt was bottled by Clydesdale Scotch Whisky Co. Glasgow.

NAME: The Last One - Young Single Malt - Milk & Honey
DESCRIPTION: Bottled as " The Last One' this is a special edition of the young single malt series is the final one before the companies commercial Single Malt Debut. Crafted by the Milk and Honey Distillery this bottle has come from a Double cask ex red wine (str) and Ex-Bourbon. It was bottled in 10th November 2018 and is 1 of 4000 bottles.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Double Cask & Gold - 2 x 5cl & Macallan Bag
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains 2 x 5cl and comes with a Macallan shopper bag:

NAME: Talisker - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.

NAME: Tobermory - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is an unpeated 10 year old from Tobermory Distillery on the Isle of Mull. This is a more gentle medium-bodied, accessible malt than the peated whisky they produce (which is marketed as Ledaig).

NAME: Glen Grant - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A 1990/2000s release of Glen Grant 10 Year Old.
Glen Grant 10 Year old has won multiple awards including: Winner of Best Single Malt Scotch Whisky 10 Years and Under in Jim Murray's Whisky Bible 2013.

NAME: Aberlour - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

NAME: Penderyn - Independence (Icons of Wales)
DESCRIPTION: This is a limited edition release from the Welsh distillery, finished in Madeira wine casks.  This whisky is in honour of Thomas Jefferson, third President of the United States, who also has a Welsh heritage.

NAME: Old Pulteney - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Matured only in air-dried, hand-selected ex-bourbon casks, Old Pulteney 12 yo Whisky has won many awards. Lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.

NAME: Highland Park - 17 Year Old - The Dark 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2017, 'The Dark' is first in the Highland Park series that celebrates the seasons on the Isle of Orkney, where Highland Park is made. The Dark is a 17-year-old single malt that has been matured in sherry casks, giving it aromas of dried fruits, nuts and herbs combined with smoky peat to as a nod to the autumn and winter seasons of Orkney.  The Light followed in 2018 symbolising spring and summer. 
The Dark is a limited release 28,000.

NAME: Deanston - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is bottling of Danston 12 Year Old, that has been matured in ex bourbon casks.  It is a well-presented bottle - typical of one of the finest distilleries in Scotland.

NAME: Deanston - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is bottling of Danston 12 Year Old, that has been matured in ex bourbon casks.  It is a well-presented bottle - typical of one of the finest distilleries in Scotland.

NAME: Highland Park - Viking Tribe
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2018, this new release from Highland Park was originally only available through Amazon UK. 
"Viking Tribe" is now part of the core Highland Park range. 
This single malt was released as a celebration of the togetherness shown by the Vikings.

NAME: Old Perth - Sherry Cask Blended Whisky
DESCRIPTION: Morrison & MacKay's Old Perth Range added this beautifully sherried blended malt made from venerable casks of Jerez - Sherry Butt, Sherry Puncheon, Sherry Hogsheads.

NAME: Arran - Robert Burns World Federation
DESCRIPTION: Bottled under the Robert Burns label this bottling of the Arran Single Malt is smooth, malty and sweet with a delicious spicy twist on the finish. "Raise a glass and toast Scotland favourite son."

NAME: Benromach - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 10 year old single malt from Benromach Distillery in Speyside. It was handcrafted by just 2 men, at what was Speyside's smallest distillery.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 10 Year Old - The Original
DESCRIPTION: A lovely bottling of Glenmorangie 10 year old, with presentation box. The 'original' sets a high standard for Highland whisky, and has gone from strength to strength since its slightly controversial packaging redesign a few years ago.

NAME: Dimple - 12 Year Old 1L
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: John Haig  Co Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 1L bottling of Haig Dimple 12-year-old blended Whisky.
It is also known as Haig Pinch across the water for our friends in the US.
This blend includes single malts from Glenkinchie and Linkwood.

NAME: Woodford Reserve - Distiller's Select Batch 481
DESCRIPTION: This is small-batch Kentucky bourbon is produced by Labrot & Graham.  It is said to be the fastest-growing bourbon in the U.S. and is the Official Bourbon of the Kentucky Derby. This is Batch 66 of the Distiller's Select.  This is an individually numbered bottle.

NAME: Suntory - Toki
DESCRIPTION:
A blended whisky from Suntory's three distilleries: Yamazaki, Hakushu and Chita.
Time in Japanese means Toki...and this release main ingredients are from Hakashu and Chita grain whisky. 
This will certainly give it a different feel from the Hibiki belnd.

NAME: Glengoyne - 10 Years Old 1990
DESCRIPTION:
This is an older style bottling of Glengoyne 10 year old single malt.
This is a highland malt and somewhat of a favourite in the Asian market.

NAME: Ruby Port 1L Bottling No: 9261
DESCRIPTION: This fine ruby port is produced in the valleys of the river Douro in NE Portugal.

NAME: Ardbeg - Supernova - 2014 Committee Release 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Supernova SN2014 is one of the peatiest (110ppm) and explosively flavoured Ardbegs ever.  This limited edition Committee Release celebrates the incredible story that Ardbeg successfully launched whisky into space and it returned. 
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Bowmore - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 70cl bottling of 12-Year-Old Bowmore. This single malt has coastal notes with gentle peat.

NAME: Laphroaig - Select
DESCRIPTION: Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Bowmore - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 70cl bottling of 12-Year-Old Bowmore. This single malt has coastal notes with gentle peat.

NAME: Teacher's - Highland Cream (1970s)
DESCRIPTION:
Teacher's Highland Cream Scotch Whisky.  A real blast from the past. This limited edition contains at least 45% of pure malt whiskies.
They believed this would guarantee the future of the blend. This is a 26 2/3 FL Oz bottling, bottled at 70 Proof.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 70cl of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 Year Old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years.
Michael Jackson, Malt Whisky Companion regards this whisky as "The greatest all-rounder in the world of malt whisky."

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old-  Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

NAME: Moet & Chandon - Brut Imperial - Champagne
DESCRIPTION: This Moët & Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne non vintage champagne - perfect for every celebration!

NAME: Dimple - 12 Year Old
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: John Haig  Co Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 75cl bottling of Haig Dimple 12-year-old blended Whisky.
It is also known as Haig Pinch across the water for our friends in the US.
This blend includes single malts from Glenkinchie and Linkwood.

NAME: Jura - 10 Year Old
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: A bottle of Jura 10 Year Old.  Originally built in 1810, the distillery fell into disrepair and wasn't revived until the 1960's by two local estate owners.

NAME: Bimber - Fortunellla - Golden Orange Liqueur
DESCRIPTION: Fortunellla is a golden orange liqueur which has been made into small batches using the most aromatic golden oranges to create a perfect balance of cirtusy, sweet and bitter top notes for a unique taste.

NAME: Ardbeg - The Shortie Smoky Porter 4 x 330ml
DESCRIPTION:
A beer (Porter) with smokey and tropical aromas...look no further...its here! Ardbeg have done it again with Shortie leading the way in crafting this beer using the same malt Ardbeg use to create their world renowned whisky!
The William Bros aided the production of this beer and after the mashing, brewing and production it has a great ABV of 6.2%.

NAME: Buffalo Trace - Single Barrel The Netherlands
DESCRIPTION:
Buffalo Trace Distillery has been making bourbon whiskey the same way for more than 200 years. The distillery and their bourbon is named in tribute to the mighty buffalo and the rugged, independent spirit of the pioneers who followed them. A great allrounder, bourbon whisky.
This release is special because it was released in the Netherlands only.

NAME: Glengoyne - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Glengoyne is mostly known for being one of the only Scottish whiskies to be distilled from completely unpeated malt.
Dried naturally before fermentation and distillation begin gives an elegant, medium-bodied style.

NAME: Highland Park - 16 Year Old Twisted Tattoo - 2019 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
For the first time, Highland Park have matured their whisky in oak casks seasoned with Spanish Rioja wine 153 in total.   There were 153 casks laid down in total.   This was married with another beautifully aged whisky, matured in 70 first-fill bourbon casks.
The result is immense and twisted tattoo was born.   A rich and full bodied 16 year old single malt.

NAME: Old Perth - Sherry Cask Blended Whisky
DESCRIPTION: Morrison & MacKay's Old Perth Range added this beautifully sherried blended malt made from venerable casks of Jerez - Sherry Butt, Sherry Puncheon, Sherry Hogsheads.

NAME: Maker's Mark - Bourbon Whisky 1L
DESCRIPTION: This small-batch bourbon, distilled, aged and bottled by Maker's Mark distillery in Loretto, Kentucky. Maker's Mark bourbon was first introduced in 1953 by "Bill" Samuels Snr, produced with the assistance with Julian 'Pappy' Van Winkle. Each batch is less than 19 barrels.

NAME: The Morrison Collection - 3 x 5cl Glen Garioch, Bowmore & Auchentoshan
DESCRIPTION:
A great selection from the Morrison company before it has been taken over.
Glen Garioch - 10 Year Old 43% 5cl
Bowmore - 12 Year Old 43% 5cl
Uchentoshan - 40% 5cl

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

NAME: Glen Coulmony - 10 Year Old - First Fill 2003
DESCRIPTION:
This 10 year old bottle of Glen Coulmony was matured in the finest bourbon oak all of which is said to make Glen Coulmony a very smooth, mellow and mature dram.
Cask number - 4116. First fill 2003.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old (Leather Case)
DESCRIPTION: The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers. This bottling comes in a leather style presentation case.

NAME: Cardhu - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Cardhu 12 year old single malt whisky from Speyside, Scotland.  This single malt was purely produced at the distillery in Morayshire, Scotland.  Although recognised as a Speyside whisky, they actually advertise being Highland Scotch Whisky. 
This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: Ardbeg - The Shortie Smoky Porter 4 x 330ml
DESCRIPTION:
A beer (Porter) with smokey and tropical aromas...look no further...its here! Ardbeg have done it again with Shortie leading the way in crafting this beer using the same malt Ardbeg use to create their world renowned whisky!
The William Bros aided the production of this beer and after the mashing, brewing and production it has a great ABV of 6.2%.

NAME: Antiquary - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This bottling from Antiquary is a blend of some of Scotland's greatest 12-year-old malt and grain whiskies, including Royal Lochnagar, Tomatin, Cragganmore, Mortlach, Bowmore, Glenkinchie to name a few. Also, a quirky feature is that In the lid of this bottle box, there is a coaster that pops out!

NAME: Royal Highland Show - 1997 Vintage Blend
DESCRIPTION: Bottled for the Royal bank of Scotlad to celebrate their partnership and sponsorship of the Royal Highland show. This blend is from the Highlands and was gifted to winners at the Royal Highland Show in 1997.

NAME: Bruichladdich - Rocks - 3rd Edition 20cl
DESCRIPTION: A multi-vintage Bruichladdich, matured in bourbon casks and further maturation in Grenache wine casks. This expression was the third edition of the Bruichladdich Rocks bottling series which began in 2007, with the final realise in 2011.

NAME: Chivas Regal - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Chivas 12 Year Old is a multi-award winning premier scotch whisky, an artful blend of many different malt and grain scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years.

NAME: Cutty Sark - Blended Scotch
DESCRIPTION:
Cutty Sark 12 Year Old is an old bottling by Berry Brothers and Rudd before they were sold to the drinks giant, Edrington.
This is a blended malt.

NAME: Bacardi - Superior 70 Proof Rum
DESCRIPTION: A light and dry rum from Bacardi. Older style measurements showing its age here with 26 2/3 FLO OZ.

NAME: Old Pulteney - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Matured only in air-dried, hand-selected ex-bourbon casks, Old Pulteney 12 yo Whisky has won many awards. Lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Auchentoshan - American Oak
DESCRIPTION: This triple distilled single malt scotch whisky from the Auchentoshan Distillery comes from a first fill North American oak casks. This bottling has a vanilla and coconut sweetness from a first fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Auchentoshan - American Oak
DESCRIPTION: This triple distilled single malt scotch whisky from the Auchentoshan Distillery comes from a first fill North American oak casks. This bottling has a vanilla and coconut sweetness from a first fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Glen Grant - Highland Malt Scotch Whisky (75cl)
DESCRIPTION: A rare, and older bottle of the infamous Speyside distillery, Glen Grant.

NAME: Dewars - 12 Year Old Double Aged
DESCRIPTION: This Dewar's 12 year old blend is called 'Double Aged', due to the 6 months of marrying in vintage oak casks that the whisky does after initial maturation and blending.

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old - Viking Pride (5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 5cl duty paid sample:
Viking Pride by Highland Park is an 18-year-old single malt.
This bottle has been bottled at its marrying strength of 46%.
For Viking Pride, Highland Parks Master Whisky Maker Gordon Motion carefully selects up to 120 casks which have matured for 18 years or longer and marries them together, the flavours slowly combine and gather depth and consistency.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Mini Set (6x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This Glenmorangie gift set contains 2 x 5cl bottles:

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers. Aged only in Oak Casks.

NAME: Assorted Minis x 11
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 11 x minis:

NAME: Haig's - Dimple
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: John Haig  Co Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This is a 75cl bottling of Haig Dimple blended Whisky.
It is also known as Haig Pinch across the water for our friends in the US.
This blend includes single malts from Glenkinchie and Linkwood.

NAME: Old St. Andrews Clubhouse
DESCRIPTION:
Old St Andrews Clubhouse, a blended whisky in the bottle form of a golf ball-shaped decanter.
Certainly one for the golf fans out there.

NAME: Laphroaig - Select
DESCRIPTION: Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Laphroaig - Select
DESCRIPTION: Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.

NAME: The Real Mackenzie - Blend
DESCRIPTION: This a litre bottle of a long-running brand in blended Scotch whisky, famous since 1826 and founded by Peter Mackenzie.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old-  Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old-  Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

NAME: Famous Grouse - Black Grouse
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse Black Grouse came to an end in 2015.  Although not mentioned by name anymore, the bottle still features a Tetrao tetrix, otherwise known as a blackcock.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 12 Year Old - Gold Reserve
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse 12 Year Old Gold Reserve has now been discontinued. It was released to celebrate a centenary of the Famous Grouse brand.  It is said to be of premium quality with a good proportion of malt whiskies (including Macallan and Highland Park) in the blend.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 12 Year Old - Gold Reserve
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction

NAME: Bell's - Special Reserve
DESCRIPTION: This Bell's Special Reserve is their new recipe only using malt whisky and having a subtle tang of Islay smoke in the mix.

NAME: Glen Garioch (4x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 4 x 5cl:

NAME: Highland Park - 10 Year Old (35cl)
DESCRIPTION:
A great little half bottle of the Orcadian Highland Park 10 Year Old. 
It is an age statement that hasn't been used too many times in the past.

NAME: Bruichladdich - (2 x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes:

NAME: GlenFinnan Malt Whisky
DESCRIPTION: The combination of pure Scottish air, soft water and golden barley create this smooth and mellow malt whisky which is matured gently in oak casks by traditional methods perfected over many years.

NAME: Dewars - White Label (Opening of Poneil)
DESCRIPTION:
Dewar's White Label was created in 1899 and has remained a best selling, blended Scotch for over a centuary.  It is a hugely popular blend, especially Stateside.  
This bottle celebrates the opening of Poneil and sales achieving an unprecedented amount of sales.

NAME: 5 x Assorted Minis
DESCRIPTION: This lot contains 5 x 5cl :

NAME: William Lawson's - Blended Scotch Whisky
DESCRIPTION: This is a non age statement blended malt by William Lawsons.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 12 Year Old - Gold Reserve
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse 12 Year Old Gold Reserve has now been discontinued. It was released to celebrate a centenary of the Famous Grouse brand.  It is said to be of premium quality with a good proportion of malt whiskies (including Macallan and Highland Park) in the blend.

NAME: Famous Grouse - Black Grouse
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse Black Grouse came to an end in 2015.  Although not mentioned by name anymore, the bottle still features a Tetrao tetrix, otherwise known as a blackcock.

NAME: Famous Grouse - Black Grouse
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse Black Grouse came to an end in 2015.  Although not mentioned by name anymore, the bottle still features a Tetrao tetrix, otherwise known as a blackcock.

NAME: The Famous Grouse
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This Famous Grouse blend is made from 100% Scotch Whiskies including the Edrington-owned Highland Park and The Macallan. 
Famous Grouse blended scotch whisky was first produced by Matthew Gloag & Son Ltd in 1896, and is currently produced and owned by The Edrington Group.

NAME: Imperial Brandy - Sandeman
DESCRIPTION: Said to be very rounded full-bodied and full of rich flavour, this is a Brandy.

NAME: Great Glen - Highland Single Malt
DESCRIPTION: Distilled, matured and bottled in Scotland. This bottling was commissioned by the Glentromie Distillery company.

NAME: Bimber - Ex-bourbon - Small Batch #72 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
From the North London Distillery Bimber, this is a 5cl bottle from their Bimber Klub. 
This is from Ex-Bourbon cask #72.

NAME: Highland Park - 8 Year Old - MacPhail's Collection (35cl)
DESCRIPTION: This Highland Park 8 Year Old was specially selected and bottled by Gordon & MacPhail for their Macphail's Collection range.

NAME: Highland Park - 8 Year Old - MacPhail's Collection (35cl)
DESCRIPTION: This Highland Park 8 Year Old was specially selected and bottled by Gordon & MacPhail for their Macphail's Collection range.

NAME: Canadian Club - 1858
DESCRIPTION: This Canadian Club was aged in white oak casks, it is a barrel blended Canadian whisky.

NAME: Famous Grouse - Smoky Black
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse Smoky Black was renamed from Black Grouse at the end of 2015.  Although not mentioned by name anymore, the bottle still features a Tetrao tetrix, otherwise known as a blackcock.

NAME: Ballantine's - Celebration
DESCRIPTION: This is a special limited edition Ballantine's bottled to celebrate the Queen's visit to Allied Distillers in July 2003.

NAME: Clontarf - Trinity - Irish Whiskey (3 x 20cl) & Glasses
DESCRIPTION: 3 x 20cl from a triple pack of 20cl stacking Clontarf bottles including the classic blend of Clontarf and the Single Malt.  This set includes 3 shot glasses.

NAME: Loch Fyne  - Liqueur
DESCRIPTION: This liqueur is sadly no longer produced. The Loch Fyne Whisky Liqueur is a combination of 12-year-old Scotch with flavours of tangerine, chocolate and orange.

NAME: Carvalho, Ribeiro and Ferreira - Aguardente Velha Reserva (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: This Portuguese brandy is from the 1980s.

NAME: Jim Beam - Double Oak
DESCRIPTION: This Jim Beam whisky has been not once but twice barreled in a charred American white oak barrel. This results in it achieving the classic Jim Beam sweetness and flavours but with a twist of spice.

NAME: Assorted Minis - (x 5)
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 5 x assorted minis:

DESCRIPTION: A 1970s bottling of Harveys Bristol Cream Sherry, with presentation tube featuring the coat of arms of the city of Bristol.

NAME: Balblair - 10 Year Old - 2 x Mini
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes: 2 x 10 Year Old Balblair 5cl.
A now discontinued 10 year old from Balblair distillery in the North of the Highlands. The air in Edderton on the Dornoch Firth is said to be The Purest in Scotland.

NAME: Bimber - New Make Batch 5cl
DESCRIPTION: This New Make Spirit from Bimber Distillery is part of Batch 177/2020 was produced to meet the high levels of interest from enthusiasts for exploring Bimber’s light and fruity spirit character before it begins its maturation journey. Bottled at ‘filling strength’ of 63.5% ABV and were released as a distillery exclusive.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old (4 x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers. Aged only in Oak Casks.

NAME: Macallan - 10 Year Old - 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
This a 10 year old Macallan 5cl miniature bottle. 
Macallan is arguably the most collectable malt in the world.  There has also been a real shift towards miniature whiskies in the Asian market recently which could make this lot very collectable indeed.

NAME: Bodegas Sauci - S' Vermouth
DESCRIPTION: Made from a white wine base of Palomino Fino and Pedro Ximénez varieties and a selection of aromatic herbs by Bodegas Sauci.

NAME: Glen Moray - Gift set (2 X 5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This Special Gift Pack contains two Glen Moray Chardonnay finish miniatures and a 'Tumbling Blocks' tower.
 
Savour the taste of Glen Moray whisky and play the 'Tumbling Blocks' game.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Loyalty Of The Wolf 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
The 'Loyalty of the Wolf' by Highland Park is a 14-year-old single malt. This is a 1L bottling.
This bottle has been matured slowly in sherry-seasoned American oak and ex-bourbon casks at 42.3%.
'Loyalty of the Wolf' celebrates the determination, co-operation, and courage in a single malt. This whisky is both sweet and complex, displaying a fine balance of contrasts, just like the Vikings - and the wolves - themselves.

NAME: Highland Park - 16 Year Old - Wings Of The Eagle 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Wings of the Eagle by Highland Park is a 16 year old single malt.
This bottle has been matured sherry-seasoned European and American oak casks at 44.5%.
Wings of the Eagle celebrates the wild island climate. Its spicy and elegant character reveals a sophisticated combination of flavours with sweet fried fruits, warm spices, dark chocolate and marzipan layered as intricately as the feathers of an eagle’s wing.

NAME: Highland Park - Spirit Of The Bear 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
This bottle, Spirit of the Bear by Highland Park has intense aromatic smokiness from their unique treeless peat.
Intensely smoky with a bold spiciness, Spirit of the Bears is inspired by the resilient nature and fierce independence of the Viking ancestors - characteristics that sit at the heart of whisky-making at Highland Park.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 17 Year Old - XVII 5cl
DESCRIPTION: This 17-year-old Bruichladdich was released in 2004, by the previous owners of the distillery.  It was matured in first-fill American oak casks.

Big Peat (Islay)

They have followed a great trend and this would go under the bracket of Island whiskies including Arran, Jura, Orkney malts and Islay whiskies.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label (20cl)
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's is a world-famous is a blend of around 40 whiskies.  This is a 20cl bottling.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old 5cl
DESCRIPTION: A 70cl of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.
